author: "Ryan Marangattu"

![](images/riddlerscreenshot.png)

In this project, I made a recreation of the Colonel Blotto game, a well known game theory problem, using RShiny. I used historical datasets from FiveThirtyEight. This project is available at <https://maranheads.shinyapps.io/331project/>.
